message.raw:
Added Genome.add_track_continuous method
  This method can be used to create new supercontig datasets, as well as
  extend existing ones along the track column. This makes it replace
  a large amount of the functionality of genomedata-load-data, as
  empty datasets are created automatically at the first call to
  genomedata-open-data.

Genomedata supercontigs are now represented as an Extendible Array (EArray)
to support this expansion on the track dimension.
message.html:
Added Genome.add_track_continuous method
This method can be used to create new supercontig datasets, as well as
extend existing ones along the track column. This makes it replace
a large amount of the functionality of genomedata-load-data, as
empty datasets are created automatically at the first call to
genomedata-open-data.

Genomedata supercontigs are now represented as an Extendible Array (EArray)
to support this expansion on the track dimension.

message:
Added Genome.add_track_continuous method
  This method can be used to create new supercontig datasets, as well as
  extend existing ones along the track column. This makes it replace
  a large amount of the functionality of genomedata-load-data, as
  empty datasets are created automatically at the first call to
  genomedata-open-data.

Genomedata supercontigs are now represented as an Extendible Array (EArray)
to support this expansion on the track dimension.
